verses.roman:
ugrasenaṁ ca pitaraṁ
sthaviraṁ rājya-kāmukaṁ
tad-bhrātaraṁ devakaṁ ca
ye cānye vidviṣo mama

synonyms: ugrasenam—King Ugrasena; ca—and; pitaram—my father; sthaviram—old; rājya—for the kingdom; kāmukam—greedy; tat-bhrātaram—his brother; devakam—Devaka; ca—also; ye—who; ca—and; anye—others; vidviṣaḥ—enemies; mama—my.
translation: I will also kill my old father, Ugrasena, who is greedy for my kingdom, and I will kill his brother Devaka and all my other enemies as well.
